story: You find yourself in a dimly lit storage room deep within the gang stronghold. The air is thick with the smell of ozone and burning circuitry. As you look around, you notice a strange energy source emitting a pulsating glow from a nearby console. The energy seems to be fluctuating wildly, causing nearby equipment to malfunction.

actions.action: Attempt to stabilize the energy source
actions.good: Your technical expertise allows you to calibrate the energy source, and it begins to stabilize. A hidden compartment opens, revealing a stash of valuable items. Your quick thinking pays off.
actions.bad: Your attempt to stabilize the energy source causes a feedback loop, leading to a surge in power that damages nearby equipment. You take damage from flying debris, but manage to avoid more severe consequences.

actions.action: Try to disconnect the energy source
actions.good: You carefully disconnect the energy source, and it ceases to malfunction. A hidden door opens, revealing a secret area containing valuable items. Your cautious approach pays off.
actions.bad: Your attempt to disconnect the energy source triggers an automatic safety protocol, releasing a cloud of noxious gas that causes you to stumble back. You take damage from the toxic fumes.

actions.action: Experiment with the energy source to see what happens
actions.good: You decide to experiment with the energy source, and it surprisingly begins to charge up your nearby equipment. A hidden cache of valuable items is revealed, and you're able to claim them as your own.
actions.bad: Your experimentation causes the energy source to overheat, leading to a catastrophic failure that destroys nearby equipment. You take damage from flying debris, but manage to avoid more severe consequences.
